defaultTemplateName.description: Default template name to be used

description.description: Text to be displayed next to the template name

dirPath.description: Path to the location where to generate files

templatePath.description: Path to the specific template folder

shouldReplaceFileName.description: Should or not extension replace a file name

fileNameTextToBeReplaced.description: Which part of the file name should be replaced

shouldReplaceFileContent.description: Should or not extension replace a file content

textToBeReplaced.description: Text (or regex) to be replaced separated by a search and replace separator

replaceTextWith.description: Text to be used for replacement separated by a separator

searchAndReplaceSeparator.description: Custom separator for search and replace

searchAndReplace.description: Add additional search and replace items through config (with extended options)

replace.description: Text to be used for replacement - or path to the file when injectFile=true

injectFile.description: Should inject a file content at the found placeholder

order.description: In which order to do the search and replace (lower order has precedence)
